summary: Eli Lilly Q4 2025 earnings released Feb 4 2026 show Zepbound global revenue of $4,261 million
content: Eli Lilly Q4 2025 earnings were released on February 4, 2026. Zepbound Q4 2025 global revenue was $4,261 million. This represents 123% growth from Q4 2024's $1,907 million. U.S. Zepbound revenue was $4.2 billion. Zepbound is marketed in Canada, Japan, and the United States. Full year 2025 Zepbound revenue was $13,542 million. Source: Eli Lilly Q4 2025 earnings press release.
